isArray
===
> Test if a value is an array.


<section class="usage">
## Usage

``` javascript
var isArray = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-array' );
```


#### isArray( value )

Tests if a value is an `array`.

``` javascript
var value = [];

var bool = isArray( value );
// returns true
```
</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">
## Examples


``` javascript
var isArray = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-array' );

console.log( isArray( [ 1, 2, 3, 4 ] ) );
// returns true

console.log( isArray( {} ) );
// returns false
```
</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
